data.text: Siɛgi zu niiti ti faa ɲɔi ɠɛɛzu,
Ni kɔɔɠɔ nua ta wuzeɠena dàalɔɠɔma,
Ani ɠila kpe ka gè falizu Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ma,
Mazɔlɔɔ toɠa màkɛ ná-seɠe ʋɛlɛi wu,
Nɔ̀ungi wuzeɠeʋɛ na, gàaɠooza sìli nuiti ba, ti ɠooliai mà.
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, woilo gòoi ma, nà wooɠulazu è ma,
Kìgi ɠa ɗa-vai wosu ma ga: «Gàiziɛ, è lati mà!»
Kɛ̀ɛ ta dèe ti ɠɛlɛni bà,
Pelei lɛ ga ze, nii è pɔ ga gè ziɛ la,
Mina dɔ̀ sìli nuiti ziimai zu,
Nà la ɠɛ ga leeni, ni kito ge la ɠɛni bɛ̀,
